data.quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
data.author: J K Rowling

data.quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends
data.author: J K Rowling

data.quote: The truth. It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should therefore be treated with caution
data.author: J K Rowling

data.quote: It is our choices, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
data.author: J K Rowling

data.quote: It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be!
data.author: J K Rowling

data.quote: Differences of habit and language are nothing at all if our aims are identical and our hearts are open.
data.author: J K Rowling

data.quote: After all, to the well-organised mind, death is but the next great adventure.
data.author: J K Rowling

data.quote: If you want to know what a man’s like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
data.author: J K Rowling

data.quote: Indifference and neglect often do much more damage than outright dislike.
data.author: J K Rowling

data.quote: People find it far easier to forgive others for being wrong than being right.
data.author: J K Rowling

data.quote: It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.
data.author: J K Rowling

data.quote: It’s the job that’s never started that takes longest to finish
data.author: J R R Tolkien

data.quote: But in the end it’s only a passing thing, this shadow; even darkness must pass
data.author: J R R Tolkien

data.quote: It is useless to meet revenge with revenge: it will heal nothing.
data.author: J R R Tolkien

data.quote: Even the smallest person can change the course of history.
data.author: J R R Tolkien

data.quote: He that breaks a thing to find out what it is, has left the path of wisdom.
data.author: J R R Tolkien

data.quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
data.author: J R R Tolkien

data.quote: The burned hand teaches best. After that advice about fire goes to the heart.
data.author: J R R Tolkien

data.quote: Never forget what you are, for surely the world will not. Make it your strength. Then it can never be your weakness. Armour yourself in it, and it will never be used to hurt you
data.author: George R.R. Martin

data.quote: Fear cuts deeper than swords.
data.author: George R.R. Martin

data.quote: People often claim to hunger for truth, but seldom like the taste when it's served up.
data.author: George R.R. Martin
